post:
WEBrimium® is proud to annouce a brand new series of VPS Plans

The WEBrimium® Premium Pure SSD RAID 10 Linux VPS are powered by the SolusVM™ VPS management software platform.
SolusVM ™,combined with the OpenVZ and KVM virtualization platform, permits management of multiple isolated VPS
on a single physical serversharing hardware, licenses, and management with maximum efficiency.


Standard Features
-Pure SSD RAID 10
-100% Uptime
-Firewall Protected
-DDoS Protected
-IPv6 Available

Do you have any questions? Dont hessitate to contact us or Email Us!



F.A.Q.

Q: Where are your servers located?
A: Buffalo, North Carolina.

Q: Are you a reseller or do you own your hardware?
A: We are not resellers. We own all the server.

Q: When does bandwidth reset then?
A: Bandwidth is reset on the due date of your server.

Q: Do you allow adult content?
A: Yes, we allow legal adult content on our servers.

Q: Do you allow VPN on your servers?
A: Yes, we do allow VPN on our servers.

Q: Do you allow IRC on your server?
A: No, we do not allow IRC or any IRC related services on our servers.

Q: Do you allow email marketing?
A: As long as there is a valid subscribe form.

Q: What methods do you accept for payment?
A: Currently we accept Paypal, and 2Checkout.
